author: rleland
msg: Remove the hardcoded port number for the cactus tests.

author: martinc
msg: Allow configuration of the size threshold below which uploads will be saved
in memory, and above which they will be saved to some alternate storage

author: martinc
msg: Add BigDecimal and BigInteger to the set of types for which default

author: martinc
msg: Do not remove the action mapping from the request for multipart requests.
This means that the action mapping will always be available under the
Globals.MAPPING_KEY request attribute, regardless of the type of request

author: craigmcc
msg: Change port numbers (8005->9005 and 8080->9090) on the Tomcat 4.0 and 4.1
tests, so that the existence of a running Tomcat on the default ports does
not interfere with being able to run them.
